findings.title: Integer Underflow on count subtraction
findings.explanation: The function run subtracts a user-controlled input from `count` without verifying that `input` does not exceed `count`, allowing an underflow which wraps the value to a very large number.
findings.fix_suggestion: Use a SafeMath library for subtraction (e.g., `count = count.sub(input)`) or explicitly require that `input <= count` before performing the subtraction.
